LC50 Crayfish, juvenile 18 mg/l/6 hr (95% confidence limit 13-25 mg/l) @ 16 °C; 3.7 mg/l/24 hr (95% confidence limit 2.9-4.6 mg/l) @ 16 °C; 1.3 mg/l/96 hr (95% confidence limit 0.93-1.9 mg/l) @ 16 °C /Conditions of bioassay not specified/

LC50 Frog larvae 9.7 mg/l/6 hr (95% confidence limit 8.8-11 mg/l) @ 16 °C; 8.5 mg/l/24 hr (95% confidence limit 7.9-9.2 mg/l) @ 16 °C; 8.7 mg/l/96 hr (95% confidence limit 7.8-9.6 mg/l) @ 16 °C /Conditions of bioassay not specified/

LC50 Mayfly nymph 1.3 mg/l/6 hr (95% confidence limit 0.85-1.8 mg/l) @ 12 °C; 0.018 mg/l/24 hr (95% confidence limit 0.011-0.030 mg/l) @ 12 °C; 0.007 mg/l/96 hr (95% confidence limit 0.005-0.011 mg/l) @ 12 °C /Conditions of bioassay not specified/
LC50 Asiatic clam, adult 13 mg/l/24 hr (95% confidence limit 9.5-16 mg/l) @ 16 °C; 8.8 mg/l/96 hr (95% confidence limit 6.2-13 mg/l) @ 16 °C /Conditions of bioassay not specified/

LC50 Grass shrimp, juvenile greater than 0.80 mg/l/6 hr @ 16 °C; 0.42 mg/l/24 hr (95% confidence limit 0.34-0.51 mg/l) @ 16 °C; 0.11 mg/l/96 hr (95% confidence limit 0.10-0.13 mg/l) @ 16 °C /Conditions of bioassay not specified/

LC50 Caddisfly, larvae 0.49 mg/l/6 hr (95% confidence limit 0.41-0.58 mg/l) @ 16 °C; 0.20 mg/l/24 hr (95% confidence limit 0.12-0.32 mg/l) @ 16 °C; 0.014 mg/l/96 hr (95% confidence limit 0.009-0.023 mg/l) @ 16 °C /Conditions of bioassay not specified/

LC50 River horn snail, adult greater than 1.0 mg/l/6 hr @ 16 °C; 0.14 mg/l/24 hr (95% confidence limit 0.13-0.16 mg/l) @ 16 °C; 0.10 mg/l/96 hr (95% confidence limit 0.088-0.11 mg/l) @ 16 °C /Conditions of bioassay not specified/
